name: Multi-Layer Radial Glow
description: Realistic glow effect using multiple shadow layers with decreasing intensity
useCase: Energy cores, light sources, hotspots, glowing orbs
visualCharacteristics: Smooth gradient from bright center to soft outer edge, depth perception
performanceNotes: ~0.5ms per glow on modern hardware. Best for static or slowly moving sources.
implementationNotes: CRITICAL: Use 'lighter' blend mode for realistic overlap
Opacity should decrease: core > mid > outer (e.g., 1.0, 0.6, 0.3)
Shadow blur should increase: core < mid < outer
